00001 <?php
00024 //  Create some tabs...
00025 CPSjqToolsWrapper::create( 'tabs', array( 'target' => 'ul.tabs', 'paneClass' => 'panes' ) );
00026 
00027 //  Create a tooltip
00028 CPSjqToolsWrapper::create( 'tooltip', array( 'target' => '#trigger' ) );
00029 
00030 //  Create form tooltips
00031 CPSjqToolsWrapper::create( 'tooltip', 
00032     array( 
00033         'target' => '#myform :input', 
00034         'position' => array( 'center', 'right' ), 
00035         'offset' => array( -2, 10 ), 
00036         'effect' => 'toggle', 
00037         'opacity' => 0.7 
00038     ) 
00039 );
00040 
00041 //  Create a tooltip
00042 CPSjqToolsWrapper::create( 'scrollable', array( 'target' => 'div.scrollable' ) );
00043 
00044 //  Create a tooltip
00045 CPSjqToolsWrapper::create( 'overlay', array( 'target' => 'button[rel]' ) );
00046 
00047 //  Create a tooltip
00048 CPSjqToolsWrapper::create( 'expose', array( 'target' => '#test' ) );
00049 
00050 ?>
00051 <h1>jQuery Tools Example Page</h1>
00052 
00053 <p>This page demonstrates the use of the CPSjqToolsWrapper class from the Pogostick Yii Extensions Library.</p>
00054 
00055 <h2>Tabs</h2>
00056 <!-- the tabs --> 
00057 <ul class="tabs"> 
00058     <li><a href="#">Tab 1</a></li> 
00059     <li><a href="#">Tab 2</a></li> 
00060     <li><a href="#">Tab 3</a></li> 
00061 </ul> 
00062  
00063 <!-- tab "panes" --> 
00064 <div class="panes"> 
00065     <div>First tab content. Tab contents are called "panes"</div> 
00066     <div>Second tab content</div> 
00067     <div>Third tab content</div> 
00068 </div>
00069 
00070 <h2>Tooltips</h2>
00071 <!-- trigger element --> 
00072 <a href="#" id="trigger"> 
00073     Move the mouse over this box to see the tooltip in action.
00074 </a> 
00075  
00076 <!-- tooltip element --> 
00077 <div class="tooltip"> 
00078     <h3>The Tooltip</h3> 
00079  
00080     <p> 
00081         <strong>A great tool for designing better layouts and more intuitive user-interfaces.</strong> 
00082     </p> 
00083  
00084     <p> 
00085         Tooltips can contain any HTML such as links, images, forms and tables.
00086         This tooltip is vertically centered on the top edge of the trigger element.
00087     </p> 
00088 </div> 
00089 
00090 <style> 
00091 /* simple css-based tooltip */
00092 div.tooltipg {
00093     background-color:#000;
00094     outline:1px solid #669;

00096     padding:10px 15px;
00097     width:200px;
00098     display:none;
00099     color:#fff;
00100     text-align:left;
00101     font-size:12px;

00104     outline-radius:4px;
00105     -moz-outline-radius:4px;
00106     -webkit-outline-radius:4px;
00107 }

00142 <h2>Form Tooltips</h2>
00143 <form id="myform"> 
00144  
00145     <h3>Registration Form</h3> 
00146  
00147     <!-- username --> 
00148     <label for="username">Username</label> 
00149     <input id="username" /> 
00150     <div class="tooltipg">Must be at least 8 characters.</div><br/> 
00151  
00152     <!-- password --> 
00153     <label for="password">Password</label> 
00154     <input id="password" type="password" /> 
00155     <div class="tooltipg">Try to make it hard to guess.</div><br /> 
00156  
00157     <!-- email --> 
00158     <label for="username">Email</label> 
00159     <input id="email" /> 
00160     <div class="tooltipg">We won't send you any marketing material.</div><br /> 
00161  
00162     <!-- message --> 
00163     <label for="body">Message</label> 
00164     <textarea id="body"></textarea> 
00165     <div class="tooltipg">What's on your mind?</div><br /> 
00166  
00167 </form>

00182 <h2>Overlay</h2>
00183 <!-- a button that triggers the overlay. the 'rel' attribute is a jQuery selector to the overlay trigger --> 
00184 <button type="button" rel="#overlay">Open overlay</button>
00185 
00186 <!-- overlayed element, which is styled with external stylesheet --> 
00187 <div class="overlay" id="overlay"> 
00188  
00189     <!-- here is the content for overlay, can be anything --> 
00190     <h2 style="margin:10px 0">Here is my overlay</h2> 
00191  
00192     <p style="float: left; margin:0px 20px 0 0;"> 
00193         <img src="http://static.flowplayer.org/img/title/eye192.png" /> 
00194     </p> 
00195  
00196     <p> 
00197          Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, 
00198          per inceptos himenaeos. Donec lorem ligula, elementum vitae, 
00199          imperdiet a, posuere nec, ante. Quisque mattis massa id metus. 
00200     </p> 
00201  
00202 </div>
